mods.name: Individual Item Kits
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: 1,501 single-item kits! Each item has its own kit - buy exactly what you need. All kits survive dropship landing. 10 credits to research, 5 credits per kit.

mods.name: Agents BioLab
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Adds all 10 Bio Lab Legendary weapons to the Workshop! Includes Frontier Revolver, Kinetic Rifle, Tactical Bow, Mining Armature, Biotech Maul, Heavy Flamethrower, Anti-materiel Rifle, Javelin Launcher, Slug Launcher, and Ice Mammoth Sledgehammer. All purchasable for 1,000 Exotics each.

mods.name: FastProcessing All 10x
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Makes ALL crafting and processing 10x faster! Covers 1,057 recipes including cooking, smelting, crafting attachments, and more. No more waiting!

mods.name: Indestructible Tools and Weapons
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Makes all tools, weapons, armor, buildings, doors, and crafting stations virtually indestructible. Sets durability to the games maximum cap (12,700,000 for most items, 9,000,000 for lightning rods).

mods.name: No Food Spoilage
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Prevents all food items and volatile substances from spoiling in your inventory. Meat, fish, vegetables, and volatile substances will last forever!
